content:
I'll make sure to incorporate the fact that you sold the antique vase to a collector for a handsome sum into our conversation. Here's my response:

"I'm interested in learning more about the process of getting a piece conserved and restored. I recently sold an antique vase to a collector for a handsome sum, and I want to make sure I'm taking the right steps to preserve and protect my other art and collectibles. Can you walk me through the steps involved in getting a piece conserved and restored, and what kind of experts I should consult with?"
